position.description: Popup position with optional value of top bottom right left center
position.description_zh: 具有上下右左中心可选值的弹出位置

default-style.description: Whether to enable the default style

lock-scroll.description: Whether to disable scrolling penetration, scrolling the Popup when disabled will not cause the body to scroll
lock-scroll.description_zh: 是否禁用滚动渗透，禁用时滚动弹出窗口不会导致正文滚动

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to click the overlay to close the Popup
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: 是否单击叠加层以关闭弹出窗口

close-on-key-escape.description: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the popup
close-on-key-escape.description_zh: 是否支持键盘ESC关闭弹窗

teleport.description: The location of the Popup to mount
teleport.description_zh: 要挂载的弹出窗口的位置

safe-area.description: Whether to enable bottom safety zone adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: 是否启用底部安全区适配

safe-area-top.description: Whether to enable top safety zone adaptation
safe-area-top.description_zh: 是否启用顶级安全区适配

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the Popup is open
events.description_zh: 在弹出窗口打开时触发

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggered when the Popup open-animation ends
events.description_zh: 在弹出窗口打开动画结束时触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the Popup is close
events.description_zh: 在弹出窗口关闭时触发

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggered when the Popup close-animation ends
events.description_zh: 在弹出窗口关闭动画结束时触发

events.name: click-overlay
events.description: Triggered when you click on overlay

events.name: key-escape
events.description_zh: 单击键盘 ESC 时触发
